description:
1.Reading is not merely sympathizing and understanding; it is also critizing and judging. ----Virginia Woolf
阅读不仅是同情与理解，也是批评与判断。 ----拂吉尼亚-伍尔夫
2.Reading is to the mind what exercise it to the body. ----Richard Steele
读书之于心灵，犹如运动之于身体。 -----理查德-蒂尔
3.Swelled heads are so preoccupied with the few things they know, so that there is no room left for the innumerable things they don't know. -----Bernard Show
自命不凡者，脑中被其所知的少数事物所占据，以致没有空间去容纳无数其所不知的事物。 -----肖伯纳.
4.Extensive reading is absolute essential rather than doing great deal of test paper.

广泛的阅读比大量的习题更重要。
5.Reading is one of the best ways of improving your vocabulary.
提高你的词汇量的最好的办法之一就是阅读。
6.Reading gives us somewhere to go when we have to stay where we are. – Mason Cooley
当我们非得待在某地的时候，读书给了我们一个去处。--麦森。库利
7.Do business,but be not a slave to it.
要做事，但不要做事务的奴隶。
8..Everybody’s business is nobody’s business.
众人的事就是无人过问的事。
9.If a man empties his purse into his head, no one can take it from him. -Benjamin Franklin
如果一个人倾其所有以求学问，那么这些学问是没有人能拿走的。 -本杰明·富兰克林
10.Education is that which remains when one has forgotten everything he learned in school. -Einstein
教育是在学校所学知识遗忘后剩下的东西。 -爱因斯坦
11.every person has two educations, one which he receives from others, and one, more important which he gives himself.
每个人都接受两种教育，一种来自别人，另一种更重要的来自自己。——e.gibbon
